properties.name: casso.cassandra.contact-points
properties.description: Set of all contact point for Apache Cassandra.

properties.name: casso.cassandra.data-center
properties.description: Name of targeted datacenter for Apache Cassandra database.

properties.name: casso.cassandra.keyspace
properties.description: Name of targeted keyspace for Apache Cassandra database.

properties.name: casso.cassandra.dll-auto
properties.description: Startup action to be executed during app startup on Apache Cassandra database. Applies to keyspace.
